meanings.definition: Not producing beneficial effects on health or well-being.
meanings.sent1: The nontherapeutic treatment did not help the patient feel better.
meanings.sent2: Using nontherapeutic methods may not improve your overall health.
meanings.sent3: The nontherapeutic remedy tasted like sour medicine.
meanings.sent4: Her nontherapeutic approach to stress relief fell flat.
meanings.sent5: The nontherapeutic massage left her feeling unchanged.

meanings.definition: Not intended to treat or cure a medical condition.
meanings.sent1: The nontherapeutic lotion was simply for moisturizing, not healing.
meanings.sent2: Nontherapeutic interventions focus on comfort rather than cure.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly applied the nontherapeutic bandage to his stuffed animal.
meanings.sent4: Her nontherapeutic advice was like a band-aid on a broken bone.
meanings.sent5: The nontherapeutic tea was soothing but not medicinal.
